org.jdrupes

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdrupes.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Matchable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Handler.NO_EVENT, NamedEvent, Started

    public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
implements Matchable
    The base class for all events. Events form a hierarchy and by default their class is used for matching, i.e. a handler is invoked if its event class is equal to or a base class of the class of the event to be handled. This default behavior may be changed by overriding the methods from Matchable. See NamedEvent as an example.
    Author:
    mnl
